subtitle: A very simple dish to make using tender lean lamb and new baby jacket potatoes.

method.text: Par-boil the potato for 5-8 min. Drain well.
In a large frying pan, heat the oil with the chilli powder. Pan-fry the lamb steaks over a medium heat until seared on both sides.
Add the potatoes and saute for 5 min or until golden brown. Add remaining ingredients. Reduce heat until lamb is cooked through and vegetables are cooked.
Serve on warmed plates, garnished with mint.
